options: It indicates that the class is abstract

java.question: Which method is called automatically when an object is created?

What does the 'static' keyword mean in Java?
options: It indicates that the variable or method belongs to the class itself
It indicates that the variable or method belongs to an instance of the class
It indicates that the variable or method is constant
It indicates that the variable or method is dynamic
java.answer: It indicates that the variable or method belongs to the class itself
